title: Florentine Renaissance: Ficino's Circle & the Platonic Academy
description: Complete collection of the Florentine Platonic Academy under Marsilio Ficino's leadership, including Pico della Mirandola, Poliziano, Landino, and Lorenzo de' Medici. Documents the Renaissance revival of Platonism, Hermeticism, and the synthesis of pagan philosophy with Christian theology.

researchValue: This collection provides complete documentation of the Florentine Platonic Academy, the single most influential intellectual circle of the Italian Renaissance. Essential for understanding the revival of ancient philosophy, the development of Renaissance humanism, the synthesis of pagan and Christian thought, and the intellectual foundations of early modern European culture.
